attributes.action: Give children more rights in family courts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children are not stupid. They know what the best environment is for themselves. It is time for family courts to STOP automatically granting residency to the mother and hear from children directly, without the interference of CAFCASS. More fathers would apply fo residency if they knew their children's points of view would be listened to, and respected. It's time to give kids a chance to decide for themselves.
